body:
you can use grep, ie


 ./vwrays.exe -fd someRender.pic | rtrace -fda `vwrays -d
zoomsomeRender.pic`
 -oodLpnsm `if(s='greenbox')` testroom.oct  | grep "surface_name" > rays.txt
